name: EKOBOX
description:
EKOBOX is a game in development and it is made by LupusEntertainment.

In game you are an Ekobox and you have to defend yourself against enemies which is garbage. At this moment we added in game just 1 enemy but we try to add more enemies in the future.

Also your best score will be saved and you will see it in menu or in pause menu.

If you like our game idea, you can follow us on Facebook.

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/LupusDev/
